---
title: Installation
---

## Requirements

- Docker (recommended) or a working Nextflow + Conda/R/Python environment
- Git (to clone this repository)

## Using the provided Docker image

A pre-built Docker image is available on Docker Hub, containing all required tools and environments for the pipeline.

You can pull it directly without needing to build locally:

```bash
docker pull hlnicholls/postgwas-pipeline:latest
```

If you are on an Apple Silicon (M1/M2) Mac, pull the amd64 version explicitly:

```bash
docker pull --platform linux/amd64 hlnicholls/postgwas-pipeline:latest
```

Run an interactive container (edit mounts to match your paths):

```bash
docker run -it --rm --name postgwas-pipeline \
  --platform linux/amd64 \
  -v "$(pwd):/nf-postgwas" \
  -v "/path/to/postgwas-db-grch38-2025-11:/nf-postgwas/postgwas-db-grch38-2025-11:ro" \
  -e NXF_WORK="/nf-postgwas/work" \
  -w /nf-postgwas \
  hlnicholls/postgwas-pipeline:latest /bin/bash
```

Inside the container you can activate the Python environment and run Nextflow:

```bash
conda activate postgwas_py39
nextflow run . -profile local -params-file params.yaml
```
